attributes.action: deny that Gary McKinnon be extradite to the US as the main issue is the lack of adequate security measures in the US system rather than the fault of Mr McKinnon.I cannot believe Britain is not prepared to defend one of his citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To deny extradition of Gary McKinnon

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
